mapper.insert: insert into Assignmnet( user_id, assign_data, amount, product_id, pay_type, assign_type, contactor, tel, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values( #{user_id}, #{assign_data}, #{amount}, #{product_id}, #{pay_type}, #{assign_type}, #{contactor}, #{tel}, 0， SYSDATE(), 0， SYSDATE() )
